Anti-communism and anti-nazim blog. 
If anyone has a HP book they don't want anymore, I will gladly give it a new home.

summary: Fish Out of Water by @sansael​ When Peter dies on Titan he doesn't think of what comes next. What happens to him, Peter Parker,...
caption:
Fish Out of Water by @sansael​

When Peter dies on Titan he doesn’t think of what comes next.

What happens to him, Peter Parker, is that he, quite frankly, wakes up in an honest to god magic castle with a Gandalf look alike peering down at him.

—–
A post-Infinity War/Harry Potter crossover.

A story about being far from home, finding love, starting to grow roots, all the while trying not to lose oneself.


Peter/Harry, Irondad.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.description: man, I just post whatever. you can still ask stuff if you want, though, and I might actually answer if I feel like it. lol jk, I'll answer! anyway, in case you hadn't noticed, I'm Spiderfan, named for my being a fan of Spider-Man. yes, I know it's a pun. go ahead and groan in annoyance, but it doesn't change my username.

blog.name: blindfreddy325

blog.description: I’m a 17 year Fangirl, I’m a table tennis playing flautist, Whovian, Halfblooded Hufflepuff, Ranger’s apprentice, Shadowhunting Avenger that’s divergent and survived the Maze and the Huger games. Who is quite a fan of Broadway despite living in Australia? I've also got FND making me legally blind and in a wheelchair amongst other symptoms. I’m not a great drawer but if anyone DMs me I’m happy to attempt any picture requests.

summary: Tomorrow people are going back to Hogwarts
body:
Tomorrow people are going back to Hogwarts

It’s that time again, September is tomorrow, and wizards all over the UK will be heading to Hogwarts for another year. But not me. I have no more school. Much like Harry Potter and Ron Granger-Weasley, I gave up at 7th year, and am leaving without any worthwhile qualifications. Sure they defeated the dark lord, but I still feel secure in my future.

reblog.comment:

summary: Чё-то решила, раз многим нравится, как я рисую по Драрри, то и порисую немного. Тем более я никогда не рисовала их детьми. Тут...
caption: Чё-то решила, раз многим нравится, как я рисую по Драрри, то и порисую немного. Тем более я никогда не рисовала их детьми. Тут они ещё не осознают, что их тянет друг другу, и я из-за этой картинки придумала новую идею для комикса!

summary:
Slytherin: I want to be like a caterpillar. Eat a lot. Sleep a lot. Wake up beautiful. 
Hufflepuff: You know most of them have a...
body:
Slytherin: I want to be like a caterpillar. Eat a lot. Sleep a lot. Wake up beautiful.

Hufflepuff: You know most of them have a lifespan of about a week, right?

Slytherin: That’s just another highlight.

summary: Wow I’m sooooo dumb I became a cat animagus and didn’t take any screenshots because I was too busy being happy watching MC and...
body:
Wow I’m sooooo dumb I became a cat animagus and didn’t take any screenshots because I was too busy being happy watching MC and Fang play together ahhhhhhh and now I can’t find how to turn back into my cat form.

Also shout out to the devs that gave my account 5000 gems to allow me to do this so quickly.

summary:
Tulip: I need you to keep an eye on MC. She's going to say the wrong thing and get herself hexed.
Merula: Sure, I would love to...
body:
Tulip: I need you to keep an eye on MC. She’s going to say the wrong thing and get herself hexed.

Merula: Sure, I would love to see MC get hexed.

Tulip: Try again.

Merula:…

Merula: I will stop MC from getting hexed?

Tulip: Good.

summary: The Hogwarts Mystery girls but if they dressed like the time period they're set in (1988) but according to a 00’s kid that was...
body:
The Hogwarts Mystery girls but if they dressed like the time period they’re set in (1988) but according to a 00’s kid that was relying on googling what 80’s fashion was.😆

@askpennyhaywood @pennyhaywood @tulipkarasuu @pennyshaywood
